citation.article-title: Roseomonas aerilata sp. nov., isolated from an air sample.
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Description of Roseomonas aerilata sp. nov.
Roseomonas aerilata (ae.ri.la′ta. L. n. aer air; L. part. fem. adj. lata carried; N.L. part. fem. adj. aerilata airborne).
Cells are Gram-negative, strictly aerobic, non-motile cocci, 1.2–1.5 μm in diameter.
Colonies are pink, round and convex with clear margins.
Growth occurs at 5–35 °C (optimum 30 °C) and pH 5–9 (optimum pH 6–7).
Growth does not occur in as little as 1 % (w/v) NaCl.
Does not decompose casein, chitin, CM-cellulose, DNA, hypoxanthine, pectin, starch, tyrosine or xanthine.
Shows negative reactions for nitrate reduction, indole production, glucose fermentation, arginine dihydrolase, hydrolysis of urea, aesculin and gelatin and β-galactosidase (API 20NE test strips).
Assimilates only suberic acid, 3-hydroxybenzoic acid and 3-hydroxybutyric acid of the substrates in API 20NE and API ID 32GN test strips.

Positive for activities of alkaline phosphatase, esterase (C4), esterase lipase (C8), acid phosphatase and naphthol-AS-BI-phosphohydrolase, but negative for lipase (C14), leucine arylamidase, valine arylamidase, cystine arylamidase, trypsin, α-chymotrypsin, α-galactosidase, β-glucuronidase, α-glucosidase, N-acetyl-β-glucosaminidase, α-mannosidase and α-fucosidase activities in API ZYM test strips.
Does not produce any acids in API 50 CH test strips.
Resistant to ampicillin (10 μg), fusidic acid (10 μg), lincomycin (15 μg), polymyxin B (300 U) and vancomycin (30 μg).

Weakly sensitive to neomycin (30 μg) and sensitive to amikacin (30 μg), cefotaxime (30 μg), cephalothin (30 μg), chloramphenicol (30 μg), ciprofloxacin (5 μg), erythromycin (15 μg), gentamicin (10 μg), kanamycin (30 μg), nalidixic acid (30 μg), penicillin (10 U), rifampicin (5 μg), streptomycin (10 μg) and tetracycline (30 μg).
The major fatty acids are C18 : 1ω7c (33.4 %), summed feature 3 (C16 : 1ω7c/iso-C15 : 0 2-OH; 32.0 %) and C16 : 0 (12.3 %).
The major isoprenoid quinone is Q-10.
The DNA G+C content of the type strain is 72.1 mol%.
The type strain is 5420S-30T (=KACC 12521T =DSM 19363T), isolated from air in the Republic of Korea.
